trans-unit.resname: What does ‘languages for specific purposes’ mean?
trans-unit.source: What does ‘languages for specific purposes’ mean?
trans-unit.target: ¿Qué son las lenguas o los lenguajes de especialidad?

trans-unit.resname: Research on languages for specific purposes is one of the most appealing branches of modern linguistics. In sign language interpreting, the specific purposes are guided by the necessity of widening and specializing the terminology in order to translate from a scientific and academic language into Spanish sign language (SSL) and the International sign system (ISS).
trans-unit.source: Research on languages for specific purposes is one of the most appealing branches of modern linguistics. In sign language interpreting, the specific purposes are guided by the necessity of widening and specializing the terminology in order to translate from a scientific and academic language into Spanish sign language (SSL) and the International sign system (ISS).
trans-unit.target: La investigación en lenguajes para fines específicos es una de las especialidades más atractivas de la lingüística actual. En la interpretación a las lenguas de signos, los fines específicos se orientan hacia la necesidad de ampliar y especializar la terminología para traducir del lenguaje científico y académico a la Lengua de Signos Española (LSE) y al Sistema de Signos Internacional (SSI).

trans-unit.resname: Which other specific languages, apart from academic, are of interest to our research?
trans-unit.source: Which other specific languages, apart from academic, are of interest to our research?
trans-unit.target: ¿Qué lenguajes específicos, además del académico, son objeto de nuestras investigaciones?

trans-unit.resname: Scientific and linguistic languages, together with academic, are of special interest to the deaf community. On the one hand, they are interested in the linguistic field as language forms a differentiating element in their community. On the other hand, the natural sciences are also of significance as they help to promote a better understanding of life and the environment. The development of these specific purposes paves the way for the still uncertain integration of deaf people into the university and vice versa.
trans-unit.source: Scientific and linguistic languages, together with academic, are of special interest to the deaf community. On the one hand, they are interested in the linguistic field as language forms a differentiating element in their community. On the other hand, the natural sciences are also of significance as they help to promote a better understanding of life and the environment. The development of these specific purposes paves the way for the still uncertain integration of deaf people into the university and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Los lenguajes científico y lingüístico, junto con el académico, son los que más interesan a la comunidad sorda. Le interesa el ámbito lingüístico porque es la lengua el elemento diferenciador de su comunidad y las ciencias de la naturaleza porque le ayudan a entender la vida y el entorno. Desarrollar estos lenguajes específicos allana el camino hacia la pendiente integración de los sordos en la universidad y viceversa.

trans-unit.resname: Besides this, we aim to provide ideas in order to help SSL and ISS interpreters and translators develop the appropriate skills not only to become familiar with the data of the scientific and academic world, but also to acquire the ability to provide satisfactory answers to the problems that arise in the interpretation of scientific texts.
trans-unit.source: Besides this, we aim to provide ideas in order to help SSL and ISS interpreters and translators develop the appropriate skills not only to become familiar with the data of the scientific and academic world, but also to acquire the ability to provide satisfactory answers to the problems that arise in the interpretation of scientific texts.
trans-unit.target: También pretendemos aportar ideas para que el profesional de la interpretación y la traducción a la LSE y SSI pueda desarrollar destrezas adecuadas que le permitan, además de aproximarse al conocimiento del mundo de la ciencia y la academia, adquirir habilidades que le faciliten las respuestas satisfactorias a los problemas que se le plantean ante una interpretación de textos científicos.

trans-unit.resname: The start of the project
trans-unit.source: The start of the project
trans-unit.target: Los comienzos del proyecto

trans-unit.resname: At the beginning, SSL linguistics and interpreters used to analyse, translate and make our own recordings. The translating process has gradually changed due to considerable progress in documentation and the creation of suitable terminology with the aid of deaf experts.
trans-unit.source: At the beginning, SSL linguistics and interpreters used to analyse, translate and make our own recordings. The translating process has gradually changed due to considerable progress in documentation and the creation of suitable terminology with the aid of deaf experts.
trans-unit.target: Al principio, los lingüistas y los intérpretes de LSE analizábamos, traducíamos y hacíamos nuestras propias grabaciones. El proceso de traducción fue cambiando poco a poco con avances considerables en la documentación y creación de terminología adecuada con la ayuda de expertos sordos.

trans-unit.resname: The progress in the quality of the translations prompted us to look for technical excellence in our recordings. Thus, with the help of Televisión Uvigo and Teltek, we were able to translate, interpret and record texts to a high quality, which were approved by Galician and Spanish deaf people and interpreters.
trans-unit.source: The progress in the quality of the translations prompted us to look for technical excellence in our recordings. Thus, with the help of Televisión Uvigo and Teltek, we were able to translate, interpret and record texts to a high quality, which were approved by Galician and Spanish deaf people and interpreters.
trans-unit.target: El progreso en la calidad de las traducciones nos llevó a la procura de la excelencia técnica de las grabaciones y, con la ayuda de Televisión Uvigo y Teltek, pudimos traducir, interpretar y grabar textos de gran calidad que son validados por signantes sordos e intérpretes de Galicia y del estado español.

trans-unit.resname: Initial results
trans-unit.source: Initial results
trans-unit.target: Primeros resultados

trans-unit.resname: We recorded scientific texts in SSL for the first time in August 2008. The first scientific texts were derived from sign language linguistics, particularly from the plenary conferences of Alejandro Oviedo, La incorporación de los gestos y la iconicidad: el análisis de las lenguas de signos: un breve repaso a la historia de la lingüística de las lenguas visuales de los sordos; Ángel López, El origen dellenguaje: entre la genética y la física; Enrique del Teso, Gramática, proposiciones e índices: cómo se hacen pensamientos completos con palabras; and the abstracts of the congress of young linguists, presented in the 3rd International Conference of Hispanic Linguistics: Young Researchers.
trans-unit.source: We recorded scientific texts in SSL for the first time in August 2008. Los primeros textos científicos procedían de la lingüística de las lenguas de signos, concretamente las conferencias plenarias de Alejandro Oviedo La incorporación de los gestos y la iconicidad: el análisis de las lenguasde signos: un breve repaso a la historia de la lingüística de las lenguas visuales de los sordos, Ángel López El origen del lenguaje: entre la genética y la física, Enrique del Teso Gramática, proposiciones e índices: cómo se hacen pensamientos completos con las palabras y los resúmenes del congreso de jóvenes lingüistas presentados en el III Congreso Internacional de Lingüística Hispánica: Jóvenes Investigadores.

trans-unit.resname: In the same year, the first tool which facilitated deaf people’s access to the university appeared: the SSL translation of the University of Vigo self-registration.

trans-unit.target: Ese mismo año nació la primera herramienta para facilitar el acceso a la universidad de las personas sordas: la traducción a la LSE de la automatrícula de la Universidad de Vigo.

trans-unit.resname: At present
trans-unit.source: At present
trans-unit.target: En la actualidad

trans-unit.resname: We are now taking a further step towards the ISS translation. A group of deaf and hearing researchers from different European and American countries is working on the translation of scientific texts from Campus del Mar, as well as building up SSL and ISS glossaries of specific languages which will allow deaf and hearing people from all over the world to have access to Science.

trans-unit.target: Hemos iniciado una nueva andadura hacia la traducción al SSI. Un equipo de investigadores sordos y oyentes de diferentes países europeos y americanos prepara la traducción de textos científicos del Campus del Mar y elabora glosarios en LSE y SSI de lenguajes específicos que permitirán el acceso a la ciencia de sordos y oyentes de todo el mundo.

trans-unit.resname: What is sonar?
trans-unit.source: What is sonar?
trans-unit.target: ¿Qué es sonar?

trans-unit.resname: The Sonar-SSL project is promoted by the International Campus of Excellence – Campus do Mar and funded by the Spanish Ministry of Education, Culture and Sport, and the Vodafone Foundation under the Spanish Subprogram of Strengthening CEI 2011. It aims to facilitate hearing-impaired people’s access to educational and scientific resources in audiovisual formats.
trans-unit.source: The Sonar-SSL project is promoted by the International Campus of Excellence – Campus do Mar and funded by the Spanish Ministry of Education, Culture and Sport, and the Vodafone Foundation under the Spanish Subprogram of Strengthening CEI 2011. It aims to facilitate hearing-impaired people’s access to educational and scientific resources in audiovisual formats.
trans-unit.target: El proyecto Sónar-LSE, promovido por el Campus de Excelencia Internacional – Campus do Mar y financiado por el Ministerio de Educación, Cultura y Deporte y la Fundación Vodafone en el marco del Subprograma de Fortalecimiento CEI 2011, tiene como objetivo facilitar el acceso de personas sordas e hipoacúsicas a contenidos educativos y divulgativos en formatos audiovisuales.

trans-unit.resname: Contrary to what one might think, deaf people’s comprehension of the written language is limited. For them, spoken languages (such as Spanish or Galician) in their written form are actually second or third languages which present their own particular obstacles to learning. The natural language of deaf people is a visual-gestural one: the Spanish Sign Language (SSL) in which they think and dream.
trans-unit.source: Contrary to what one might think, deaf people’s comprehension of the written language is limited. For them, spoken languages (such as Spanish or Galician) in their written form are actually second or third languages which present their own particular obstacles to learning. The natural language of deaf people is a visual-gestural one: the Spanish Sign Language (SSL) in which they think and dream.
trans-unit.target: En contra de lo que se podría pensar, la comprensión de la lengua escrita por parte de las personas sordas es limitada. Para los sordos, las lenguas orales (español o gallego) en la modalidad escrita son segundas o terceras lenguas con especial dificultad en el aprendizaje. La lengua natural de las personas sordas es una lengua visogestual: la Lengua de Signos o Señas Española (LSE) en la que piensan y sueñan.

trans-unit.resname: In order to overcome the differences between disparate sign languages, many researchers in the linguistics of these languages propose the use of American Sign Language (ASL) as the lingua franca, however the deaf community prefers the International Sign System (ISS).
trans-unit.source: In order to overcome the differences between disparate sign languages, many researchers in the linguistics of these languages propose the use of American Sign Language (ASL) as the lingua franca, however the deaf community prefers the International Sign System (ISS).
trans-unit.target: Para superar las diferencias entre las distintas lenguas de signos, muchos investigadores en la lingüística de estas lenguas proponen el uso de la American Sign Language (ASL) como lengua franca, pero la comunidad sorda prefiere el Sistema de Signos Internacional (SSI).

trans-unit.resname: Regardless of the gestural lingua franca (either ISS or ASL), at this moment in time it is of paramount importance to provide quality scientific and cultural resources in visual-gestural languages for the deaf people of the 21st century. Campus do Mar, thanks to the financial support of the above institutions, has created this portal which intends, apart from becoming a reference in the adaptation of educational and scientific resources, to bring science closer to the Spanish and global deaf community.
trans-unit.source: Regardless of the gestural lingua franca (either ISS or ASL), at this moment in time it is of paramount importance to provide quality scientific and cultural resources in visual-gestural languages for the deaf people of the 21st century. Campus do Mar, thanks to the financial support of the above institutions, has created this portal which intends, apart from becoming a reference in the adaptation of educational and scientific resources, to bring science closer to the Spanish and global deaf community.
trans-unit.target: En estos momentos, independientemente de la lengua gestual vehicular (SSI o ASL), resulta fundamental proporcionar a los sordos del siglo XXI contenidos científicos y culturales de calidad en lenguas visogestuales. Campus do Mar, gracias al apoyo de los organismos financiadores, ha creado este portal que pretende, además de convertirse en un referente en la adaptación de contenidos educativos y divulgativos, acercar la ciencia a la comunidad sorda española y de todo el mundo.
